import { PackageCmd } from '@theguild/components'

# CF Workers KV

If you are using Mesh on Cloudflare Workers, you can use KV cache as a storage.

To get started with this caching strategy, install it:

<PackageCmd packages={['@graphql-mesh/cache-cfkw']} />

## How to use?

```yaml
cache:
  file:
    namespace: MY_MESH_CACHE
```

## Config API Reference

import API from '../../../generated-markdown/CFWorkersKVCacheConfig.generated.md'
